ygData.subject: RE: Red Headband Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: The purple headband is the single largest joke I ve seen in a long time in EQ.  You finally get all the pieces (skull, dagger, coronet), and lo and behold you
ygData.messageBody:
The purple headband is the single largest joke I've seen in a long time in
EQ. You finally get all the pieces (skull, dagger, coronet), and lo and
behold you get the purple headband, and wohoo! It's the same as the red
except it's +3 HP instead of +2. Unreal.

-R

-----Original Message-----
From: Aaron Braunstein [mailto:aaron_spam@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 3:13 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Red Headband Quest


From: Aaron Braunstein <aaron_spam@...>

Sadly, and despite my rampant enthusiasm in completing
quests, the resultant items are nowhere near worth it in terms of
time nor plat required to acquire the quest items. I remember how
neat it was to get my first white training sash... it was the first
'magic' item of any kind that I had ever owned. But soon the items
required to obtain higher sashes demanded levels the normal
acheivement of which would give you better items in any event!
